rounds.comments: (Alex Trebek: We'll give you the Latin names of chemical elements; you have to give the English.)

clues.text: Ferrum

Natrium

rounds.text: Clipper Goodwill, a Boeing 727, took this airline's last passengers from Barbados to Miami December 4, 1991
